nl.strohalm.cyclos.themes

Interface ThemeHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseThemeHandler, ThemeHandlerImpl

    public interface ThemeHandler
    Defines methods for managing themes
    Author:
    luis

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void export(Theme theme, java.io.OutputStream out)
      Exports the current settings with meta-data retrieved by the given theme object.
      void importNew(java.lang.String fileName, java.io.InputStream in)
      Imports a new theme from the given file.
      java.util.List<Theme> list()
      Lists available themes
      void remove(java.lang.String fileName)
      Removes the theme with the given file name
      void select(java.lang.String fileName)
      Selects the theme with the given file name
      void validateForExport(Theme theme)
      Checks if the given theme descriptor is valid for exporting a theme

    • Method Detail

      • export

        void export(Theme theme,
          java.io.OutputStream out)
        Exports the current settings with meta-data retrieved by the given theme object. The output stream is closed after writing all data

      • importNew

        void importNew(java.lang.String fileName,
             java.io.InputStream in)
        Imports a new theme from the given file. The input stream is closed after reading all data

      • list

        java.util.List<Theme> list()
        Lists available themes

      • remove

        void remove(java.lang.String fileName)
        Removes the theme with the given file name

      • select

        void select(java.lang.String fileName)
        Selects the theme with the given file name

      • validateForExport

        void validateForExport(Theme theme)
                       throws ValidationException
        Checks if the given theme descriptor is valid for exporting a theme
        Throws:
        ValidationException
